description.S1: Celeste needs to see what the rest of Halcyon wears outside of Byzantium.
description.S2: Speak to Celeste while wearing a suit of armor and headpiece from the following sets:

blurb.B1: Acquire Iconoclast Armor and Headpiece, Marauder Armor and Headpiece and Spacer Armor and Headpiece and model them for her.
blurb.B3: she'll ask you to gather some materials.

description.S1: Celeste needs ten strips of primal leather.
description.S2: Primals can be found in the Emerald Vale region.

description.S1: Celeste needs the chitin of a Mantiqueen.
Celeste needs three pieces of raptidon flank hide.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Yes. That's it. I have it. I know exactly what we're doing. Brace yourself, my dear. We're going to call this style *barbarian-chic.*

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: The saucy confidence of a spacer. The raw contempt of an Iconoclast. The brutish musk of a marauder. And the pièce de résistance? Monster leather.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: One part mantiqueen chitin. Three parts hide from a raptidon's flank. And let's say - oh -  eight strips of primal leather. No, make that ten.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I was expecting a simple modeling job.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: We're revolutionizing the fashion of Byzantium. Our work is anything but simple.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: The reward better be worth the risk.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll come back when I've got something for you.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: We're artists. If we're not willing to risk our lives for the sake of art, we should get out of the business.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Get this done for me, and I'll have you strutting about in a Jolicoeur Original. You will be the envy of Byzantium.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: My dear, I have the highest confidence in you.
